name: brianzelip.github.io
description: Personal profile page of Brian Zelip

scripts.css: cat src/*.css > css/bundle.css && postcss -u autoprefixer --autoprefixer.browsers '> 5%' -u cssnano -o css/bundle.css css/bundle.css
scripts.watch_css: cat src/*.css > css/bundle.css && postcss -u autoprefixer --autoprefixer.browsers '> 5%' -u cssnano -o css/bundle.css css/bundle.css -w
scripts.dev: cat src/*.css > css/bundle.css && postcss -u autoprefixer --autoprefixer.browsers '> 5%' -u cssnano -o css/bundle.css css/bundle.css -w && http-server .
scripts.serve: http-server . && cat src/*.css > css/zelip.css && postcss -u autoprefixer --autoprefixer.browsers '> 5%' -u cssnano -o css/zelip.min.css css/zelip.css -w

author: Brian Zelip
